statements: UPDATE player_interactions SET message = 'New message' WHERE interaction_id = 1;

UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE player_id = 123 AND interaction_id = 456 AND timestamp = '2022-01-30 08:00:00';
UPDATE player_interactions SET message = 'Hello World' WHERE player_id = 456 AND interaction_type = 'comment' AND timestamp = '2022-02-15 13:30:00';

UPDATE player_communication SET message_content = 'Hello, how are you?' WHERE sender_id = 456 AND receiver_id = 789
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 'like' WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE player_communication SET sender_id = 456, receiver_id = 789, message_content = 'Hello, How are you?' WHERE player_id = 456 AND message_timestamp = '2022-03-08 10:30:00'
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 2 WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE player_messages SET message_text = 'Hello, have a nice day!' WHERE player_id = 54321;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_type = 2, interaction_timestamp = '2022-05-20 15:30:00' WHERE player_id = 101;
UPDATE player_messages SET message_text = 'New message content', message_timestamp = '2022-06-10 08:45:00', player_id = 202 WHERE message_id = 15;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_description = 'Changed interaction description' WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
UPDATE player_communications SET communication_content = 'New communication content' WHERE communication_id = 100;
UPDATE player_interactions SET interaction_description = 'Updated interaction description' WHERE player_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'like';
UPDATE player_warnings SET warning_reason = 'Account violation' WHERE player_id = 456 AND warning_id = 789;
UPDATE Player SET player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE Game SET game_category = 'Action' WHERE game_id = 3;
UPDATE Player SET player_name='John Doe', player_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE player_id=7;
UPDATE Game SET game_category='Action' WHERE game_id=15;
